snippet: Supporters of Bill de Blasio were asked to make a donation and told they would have an opportunity to have dinner with Alec Baldwin.
abstract: Trailside blog; dinner at which supporters of New York City mayoral candidate Bill de Blasio were asked to make donation for opportunity to meet with Alec Baldwin is causing battle between de Blasio's campaign and city's Campaign Finance Board; board has refused to match contributions in connection with event, saying it was akin to a raffle.
lead_paragraph: Supporters of Bill de Blasio were asked to make a donation and told they would have an opportunity to have dinner with Alec Baldwin.

headline.main: De Blasio Campaign in Fight Over Money From Alec Baldwin Fund-Raiser
headline.print_headline:
De Blasio and City
Spar Over a Dinner
